typeProperties.command:
.append Temp_SelectedJob with(tags='["test"]') <|
    CIS_Metadata_Job
    | where Workflow in ('BootstrapDCSeedingServerWorkflow', 'CreateVMandJoinDomainWorkflow', 'SetupCASeedServerWorkflow') and ParentId != '' and ParentId == RootId
    | join kind=inner WorkloadMapping
        on DisplayName
    | project JobId, ParentId, RootId, DisplayName, Cloud, Tenant, ServiceHostCapability,
        CreatedDate, StartDate, FinishDate, StateName, PackageId, Workflow, HostName, ServiceHostLocation,
        Timestamp, Notes, IsBlockingPathCandidate, IsBlockingPathPresent, ComponentOwnerId, OwningTeamId,
        Client, ParametersJson, SettingsJson, MdmId, TotalTaskCount, FinishedTaskCount, BlockedTaskCount,
        FinishTaskPercentage=1.0 * FinishedTaskCount/TotalTaskCount, FinishTaskProgress=strcat(FinishedTaskCount,"/",TotalTaskCount), 
        WorkflowName=Workflow, WorkloadDisplay, WorkloadName

.create-merge table Temp_SelectedJob (JobId:string, ParentId:string, RootId:string, DisplayName:string, Cloud:string, Tenant:string, ServiceHostCapability:string, CreatedDate:datetime, StartDate:datetime, FinishDate:datetime, StateName:string, PackageId:string, Workflow:string, HostName:string, ServiceHostLocation:string, Timestamp:datetime, Notes:string, IsBlockingPathCandidate:string, IsBlockingPathPresent:string, ComponentOwnerId:string, OwningTeamId:string, Client:string, ParametersJson:string, SettingsJson:string, MdmId:string, TotalTaskCount:int, FinishedTaskCount:int, BlockedTaskCount:int, FinishTaskPercentage:real, FinishTaskProgress:string, WorkflowName:string, WorkloadDisplay:string, WorkloadName:string)

.append Temp_TaskRunningState with(tags='["test"]') <|
    CIS_Metadata_Task
    | join kind=inner CIS_Metadata_Job
        on JobId
    | join kind=inner WorkloadMapping
        on $left.DisplayName1 == $right.DisplayName
    | join kind=inner ServiceTime
        on $left.DisplayName == $right.ServiceName and $left.DisplayName1 == $right.JobDisplayName
    | where RootId == ParentId and RootId != "" and StateName1 != 'Finished'
    | order by DisplayName1, DisplayName
    | project
        Timestamp1,
        TaskName=DisplayName,
        WorkflowName=Workflow,
        StateName1,
        JobId,
        ServiceTime,
        ParentId,
        MdmId,
        Workload=WorkloadDisplay,
        DurationHour,
        DurationMinute,
        DurationSecond,
        NeedTime

.append Temp_MonthIncidentCounts with(tags='["test"]') <|
(
(
CIS_Metadata_Incident
| join kind=inner CIS_Metadata_Job
    on JobId
| where ParentId != '' and ParentId == RootId
| project
    Times=CreatedDate1,
    Year=toint(getyear(CreatedDate1)),
    Month=toint(getmonth(CreatedDate1)),
    WorkloadId=JobId)
| union (
    CIS_Metadata_Incident
    | join kind=inner CIS_Metadata_Job
        on JobId
    | where ParentId != RootId
    | project
        Times=CreatedDate1,
        Year=toint(getyear(CreatedDate1)),
        Month=toint(getmonth(CreatedDate1)),
        WorkloadId=ParentId))
| summarize Count=count() by Year, Month, WorkloadId
| order by Year, Month
| join kind=inner CIS_Metadata_Job
    on $left.WorkloadId == $right.JobId
| join kind=inner CIS_Metadata_Job
    on $left.ParentId == $right.JobId
| join kind=inner WorkloadMapping
    on DisplayName
| project Timestamp=CreatedDate1, WorkloadId, RootId, MdmId, Workload=WorkloadDisplay, Year, Month, Count

.create-merge table Temp_TaskRunningState (Timestamp:datetime, TaskName:string, WorkflowName:string, StateName:string, JobId:string, ServiceTime:int, ParentId:string, MdmId:string, Workload:string, DurationHour:int, DurationMinute:int, DurationSecond:int, NeedTime:int)
.create-merge table Temp_MonthIncidentCounts (Timestamp:datetime, WorkloadId:string, RootId:string, MdmId:string, Workload:string, Year:int, Month:int, Count:long)
